attributes.action: massively reduce the prices of female sanitary products
attributes.background:
Having females pay for sanitary products is discusting. 
Without women having access to these products they may become severely Ill and even die. 
This is not good enough. 
In a world created by women, this MUST change.
(Written by a man)

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for retailers and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to consider signing one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229690
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233254
